languages.text: "У меня есть два относительно надежных свидетельства. Согласно одному, ксенос внезапно начал набрасываться на членов экипажа, потроша их без разбора и порядка. Второй утверждает, что в сопредельных отсеках заперлось множество уцелевших. Блюстителям удалось изолировать бесноватого ксеноса в одном тупике... но усмирить его силами экипажа не удается. Какие приказания?"

traits.locale_text: "У меня есть два относительно надежных свидетельства. Согласно одному, ксенос внезапно начал набрасываться на членов экипажа, потроша их без разбора и порядка. Второй утверждает, что в сопредельных отсеках заперлось множество уцелевших. Блюстителям удалось изолировать бесноватого ксеноса в одном тупике... но усмирить его силами экипажа не удается. Какие приказания?"

languages.text: "I have two fairly reliable witness accounts. According to one, the xenos suddenly assaulted the crew members, gutting them seemingly at random. The other claims that there are survivors who barricaded themselves in the adjacent compartments. The enforcers managed to isolate the raving xenos in a dead end... But they have been unable to pacify him so far. What will your orders be?"
languages.original_text: "У меня есть два относительно надежных свидетельства. Согласно одному, ксенос внезапно начал набрасываться на членов экипажа, потроша их без разбора и порядка. Второй утверждает, что в сопредельных отсеках заперлось множество уцелевших. Блюстителям удалось изолировать бесноватого ксеноса в одном тупике... но усмирить его силами экипажа не удается. Какие приказания?"

The other claims that there are survivors who barricaded themselves in the adjacent compartments. The enforcers managed to isolate the raving xenos in a dead end... But they have been powerless to pacify him so far. What will your orders be?"

The other claims that there are survivors who barricaded themselves in the adjacent compartments. The enforcers managed to isolate the raving xenos in a dead end... But they have been powerless to pacify him so far. What will your orders be?"

But they have been unable to pacify him so far. What will your orders be?"

But they have been unable to pacify him so far. What will your orders be?"

"I have two fairly reliable witness accounts. According to one, the xenos suddenly assaulted the crew members, gutting them seemingly at random. The other claims that there are survivors who barricaded themselves in the adjacent compartments. The enforcers managed to isolate the raving xenos in a dead end... But they have been unable to pacify him so far. What will your orders be?"

languages.text: “我收到了两份相当可靠的证人供词。其中一个人说那个异形突然开始袭击船员，所有被他撞到的人都会被膛破肚。而另一个人说，活下来的人把自己锁在了隔壁的船舱里。执法者成功地将那个发了疯的异形隔断在死胡同里……但到目前为止，没人能将他制服。您有什么指示？”
languages.original_text: "I have two fairly reliable witness accounts. According to one, the xenos suddenly assaulted the crew members, gutting them seemingly at random. The other claims that there are survivors who barricaded themselves in the adjacent compartments. The enforcers managed to isolate the raving xenos in a dead end... But they have been unable to pacify him so far. What will your orders be?"

traits.locale_text: “我收到了两份相当可靠的证人供词。其中一个人说那个异形突然开始袭击船员，所有被他撞到的人都会被膛破肚。而另一个人说，活下来的人把自己锁在了隔壁的船舱里。执法者成功地将那个发了疯的异形隔断在死胡同里……但到目前为止，没人能将他制服。您有什么指示？”

languages.text: « Je dispose de deux témoignages relativement fiables. Selon le premier, le xénos s'en est subitement pris aux membres d'équipage en les éventrant de manière totalement arbitraire. L'autre affirme que des survivants se sont retranchés dans les compartiments adjacents. Les prévôts ont réussi à isoler le xénos en furie dans un cul-de-sac... mais ils sont incapables de le calmer. Quels sont vos ordres ? »
languages.original_text: "I have two fairly reliable witness accounts. According to one, the xenos suddenly assaulted the crew members, gutting them seemingly at random. The other claims that there are survivors who barricaded themselves in the adjacent compartments. The enforcers managed to isolate the raving xenos in a dead end... But they have been unable to pacify him so far. What will your orders be?"

traits.locale_text: « Je dispose de deux témoignages relativement fiables. Selon le premier, le xénos s'en est subitement pris aux membres d'équipage en les éventrant de manière totalement arbitraire. L'autre affirme que des survivants se sont retranchés dans les compartiments adjacents. Les prévôts ont réussi à isoler le xénos en furie dans un cul-de-sac... mais ils sont incapables de le calmer. Quels sont vos ordres ? »

languages.text: «Tengo a dos testigos fiables. Según el primero, el xenos atacó a los tripulantes de repente, destripando a cualquiera que se encontraba. El segundo afirma que hay supervivientes atrincherados en los compartimentos adyacentes. El personal de seguridad ha arrinconado al trastornado xenos en un corredor sin salida... Pero todavía no han logrado que se calme. ¿Qué ordena hacer al respecto?».
languages.original_text: "I have two fairly reliable witness accounts. According to one, the xenos suddenly assaulted the crew members, gutting them seemingly at random. The other claims that there are survivors who barricaded themselves in the adjacent compartments. The enforcers managed to isolate the raving xenos in a dead end... But they have been unable to pacify him so far. What will your orders be?"

traits.locale_text: «Tengo a dos testigos fiables. Según el primero, el xenos atacó a los tripulantes de repente, destripando a cualquiera que se encontraba. El segundo afirma que hay supervivientes atrincherados en los compartimentos adyacentes. El personal de seguridad ha arrinconado al trastornado xenos en un corredor sin salida... Pero todavía no han logrado que se calme. ¿Qué ordena hacer al respecto?».

languages.text: 「信頼できる目撃証言が2つあります。一人目の証言によると、異種族は突然クルーに襲いかかり、無差別に内臓をえぐり出したとのこと。もう一人は、隣接するコンパートメントにバリケードを築いた生存者がいると主張しています。エンフォーサーたちは、暴れる異種族を行き止まりに隔離することに成功しました。しかし、今のところ彼をなだめることはできていません。いかがいたしましょう？」
languages.original_text: "I have two fairly reliable witness accounts. According to one, the xenos suddenly assaulted the crew members, gutting them seemingly at random. The other claims that there are survivors who barricaded themselves in the adjacent compartments. The enforcers managed to isolate the raving xenos in a dead end... But they have been unable to pacify him so far. What will your orders be?"

traits.locale_text: 「信頼できる目撃証言が2つあります。一人目の証言によると、異種族は突然クルーに襲いかかり、無差別に内臓をえぐり出したとのこと。もう一人は、隣接するコンパートメントにバリケードを築いた生存者がいると主張しています。エンフォーサーたちは、暴れる異種族を行き止まりに隔離することに成功しました。しかし、今のところ彼をなだめることはできていません。いかがいたしましょう？」

languages.text: "Mir liegen zwei ziemlich glaubwürdige Zeugenaussagen vor. Einer Aussage zufolge griff der Xenos plötzlich die Crewmitglieder an und weideten sie anscheinend zufällig aus. Der andere Zeuge behauptet, dass es Überlebende gäbe, die sich in den angrenzenden Abteilen verbarrikadiert hätten. Es ist den Enforcern gelungen, den wirren Xenos in eine Sackgasse zu drängen ... Sie haben es aber bisher nicht geschafft, ihn zu beruhigen. Wie lautet Euer Befehl?"
languages.original_text: "I have two fairly reliable witness accounts. According to one, the xenos suddenly assaulted the crew members, gutting them seemingly at random. The other claims that there are survivors who barricaded themselves in the adjacent compartments. The enforcers managed to isolate the raving xenos in a dead end... But they have been unable to pacify him so far. What will your orders be?"

traits.locale_text: "Mir liegen zwei ziemlich glaubwürdige Zeugenaussagen vor. Einer Aussage zufolge griff der Xenos plötzlich die Crewmitglieder an und weideten sie anscheinend zufällig aus. Der andere Zeuge behauptet, dass es Überlebende gäbe, die sich in den angrenzenden Abteilen verbarrikadiert hätten. Es ist den Enforcern gelungen, den wirren Xenos in eine Sackgasse zu drängen ... Sie haben es aber bisher nicht geschafft, ihn zu beruhigen. Wie lautet Euer Befehl?"

languages.text: "İki tane tanığım var, güvenilir sayılırlar. Birinin dediğine göre zeno, aniden mürettebata saldırıp rastgele kıyım yapmış. Diğeri de hayatta kalanların bitişikteki kompartımanlara saklandığını söylüyor. İnfazcılar, azılı zenoyu köşeye sıkıştırmış... Fakat henüz kendisini sakinleştirememişler. Emirleriniz nedir?"
languages.original_text: "I have two fairly reliable witness accounts. According to one, the xenos suddenly assaulted the crew members, gutting them seemingly at random. The other claims that there are survivors who barricaded themselves in the adjacent compartments. The enforcers managed to isolate the raving xenos in a dead end... But they have been unable to pacify him so far. What will your orders be?"
